name: TooStrong
description:
You are a superhero trying to save civilians in a building from monsters. Your objective is to save as many civilians as possible (by grabbing them and putting them next to the exit). Not only will you be fighting the monsters, but you will be also fighting yourself. You must be aware of how much strength you use when you grab the civilians and when you punch the bad guys.

Instructions:

WASD to move around. 

You click J to punch a monster or grab an innocent.

The bar on the top left indicates how much power you're using. If you grab someone too strong you squeeze them to death. The stronger you punch the bigger the explosion.
